CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total training hours?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Management Team}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total training hours?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sales Team}.

VE.Q: What is Sales Team's Training Hours in 1989?
VE.A: Sales Team's training hours in 1989 is {6.96} hours/employee.

VE.Q: What is Administrative Support's Training Hours in 1984?
VE.A: Administrative Support's training hours in 1984 is {10.72} hours/employee.

VE.Q: What is Human Resources's Training Hours in 1989?
VE.A: Human Resources's training hours in 1989 is {52.68} hours/employee.

VE.Q: What are the training hours of Management Team, Sales Team, and Human Resources in 1979?
VE.A: Management Team's training hours is {21.29} hours/employee, Sales Team's training hours is {20.71} hours/employee, Human Resources's training hours is {17.91} hours/employee.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Training Hours in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total training hours is {98.17} hours/employee.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Training Hours in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total training hours is {151.40} hours/employee.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Sales Team's Training Hours area?
SC.A: The average height of Sales Team's training hours area is {12.49} hours/employee.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Research & Development's Training Hours area?
SC.A: The average height of Research & Development's training hours area is {27.09} hours/employee.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Administrative Support's Training Hours area?
SC.A: The average height of Administrative Support's training hours area is {14.17} hours/employee.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Human Resources's Training Hours area?
SC.A: The average height of Human Resources's training hours area is {33.49} hours/employee.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Training Hours go below 108 hours/employee? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {104.12} hours/employee in {1981}, total value was {103.26} hours/employee in {1980}, total value was {98.17} hours/employee in {1979}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Training Hours exceed 127 hours/employee? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {146.64} hours/employee in {1988}, total value was {151.40} hours/employee in {1989}, total value was {143.73} hours/employee in {1987}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Training Hours fall between 111 and 123 hours/employee? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1984, did the total Training Hours experience a larger or smaller change than between 1988 and 1989?
NC.A: The change in total training hours between {1981} and {1984} was {larger} than between {1988} and {1989}.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1984, did the total Training Hours experience a larger or smaller change than between 1984 and 1989?
NC.A: The change in total training hours between {1979} and {1984} was {smaller} than between {1984} and {1989}.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1980, was the average total Training Hours higher or lower than between 1981 and 1985?
NC.A: The average total training hours between {1979} and {1980} was {lower} than between {1981} and {1985}.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1983, did the total Training Hours experience a larger or smaller change than between 1986 and 1989?
NC.A: The change in total training hours between {1980} and {1983} was {smaller} than between {1986} and {1989}.
